title: Team Rocket Recruiting for Global Domination (of oce)
body: Looking to recruit more people to our club its currently sitting at 42 members Hoping to help it grow and get more people playing together - helping each other with missions as I tend to do for a large percentage of my friends list.  If you're interested add  Poonomon or Pokomon. Being my partner and myself let us know you are looking to join and we will invite you in. We play all game modes. Happy to help with ranked or just some mess around arams or normals. Hope to see you in the rift.

replies.body: You guys still looking for new members?
